description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Card' used to render a styled container for UI elements such as forms and lists. It includes a header section with optional title, subtitle, and actions, and a main body section to render child elements.

methods.name: Card({ title, subtitle, children, actions })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a styled card layout with optional header and actions.
